requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Hello!!! I'm sure you've already figured this out, but I'd like to request a "Made in Wario Ashley and Red swap!"
I think it would be easier to understand their relationship if you look at the Pixiv Dictionary.

The flow of the story
Scene 1
Ashley and Red are making a new potion in the witch's cauldron. The cauldron explodes while the ingredients are being added.
Their bodies switch places.

Scene 2
Ashley checking out her new body [Red inside] Describing a girl who is curious about her body and a little excited (just a slight description is fine).
Red [inside Ashley] angrily trying to stop it.

--------I'd be happy if the scene changes as time passes here, like the one where Miku and Ren switch places and then the scene switches to the one where Miku (Ren inside) is in tattered condition. ---------

Scene 3
Red (Ashley) is mixing a potion to restore her body to its original state. When Ashley (Red) is about to give her the last ingredient, Ashley (Red) says, "I want to stay like this a little longer" (Red is in a weaker position, so she is afraid to say this). (You can add the content of the statement in the summary column.)
Red [Ashley] is enraged when she hears this statement. The impact of the incident causes the wrong material (maybe the ğŸ° stuffed animal that Ashley often carries?) to enter the cauldron and explode again. ) enters the cauldron and explodes again, sending smoke into the room.

Scene 4
Red [Ashley] checking his own body after the smoke clears. Disappointed that he has not returned to his original body, he checks Ashley [Red] and finds that he has become Ashley himself, inside and out.
Red [Ashley] insists that he is the real Ashley, but the new Ashley is pissed off at him (because the new Ashley seems to think that Red is pretending that he is not back to normal).

------ I'll be fine from here on down, as soon as I get around to drawing it!
Last panel
New Ashley is having a tea party (she doesn't have to have a partner. If she does, Penny would be a good choice), and Red [Ashley] is sad and reluctant to serve her.

I'm told my detailed description of the situation last time helped, so here's a longer version! Sorry again for the bad ending request!
If you have any questions, please contact me on Twitter or message me, thank you!

en.planDescription:
This is my first request. Please don't mind the recommended tags.

Basically, I am open to any character. (I would like to try my hand at things I don't usually draw, so please don't hesitate to contact me.)


I do not accept R-18 type illustrations.

Please feel free to send me your ideas.

planDescription.planOriginalDescription:
1. If you are affected by the Region Lock, send me a DM

2. Choose from the characters in my work.
(If you want a new character, please DM and purchase "New character creation request" separately.)

3. You can request a story-based Manga with no lines.
(But if you offer dialogues, I'll apply it.)

4. Please refer to my other works before requesting.

5. I produce about 40 to 50 pictures per episode.

6. You can ask questions DM before applying for a request.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
The last manga we commissioned about two female college students was so interesting that we would like to commission another four-page manga.

We would like you to use the same female college student characters this time as in the previous manga request, which should make the process easier.

I would like you to refer to this link.

 https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/56146895#1

Scenario Description.

Girl 1 = wears glasses
Girl 2 = girl without glasses

I want to see these collage girls having fun while blowing smoke rings nearby. Girl 1 is trying to get attention by blowing two or three smoke rings towards Girl 2, but Girl 2 doesn't notice the smoke rings as she smokes; Girl 1 starts looking towards Girl 2 while Girl 2 smokes and lets the smoke slowly drift up and out of her lips. Girl 1 notices that Girl 2's hands are relaxed, elbows on the table or slightly slanted (in a similar fashion to the link above). Girl 1 comes up with an idea and wants to see Girl 1 do this.

Close up of girl 1 during steps 1 - 4?

1 Girl 1 inhales smoke 
2 Girl 1 holds the smoke in her mouth and closes her mouth.
3 Girl 1 opens her mouth into an "O" and her mouth is full of smoke.
4 Girl 1 blows a ring of smoke out of her mouth.

4 The ring of smoke produced by Girl 1 floats slowly toward Girl 2's hand. It then fits snugly around her finger and begins to evaporate. Girl 2 notices that the ring of smoke around her finger has begun to evaporate, and Girl 2 begins to blush.

The cartoon ends there.

No nudity, and a good place for this would be a bar, home, restaurant, cafÃ©, lounge, or some other kind of indoor setting.

The cartoon should be in black and white and the smoke should be like the one in the link above or something like this.

 https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/95580442

If you have time, please consider this request. Sorry if my Japanese is not clear. I am using a different online translator called "DeepL". Hope this helps you to understand better.

en.planDescription:
One four-frame comic for one page. We will make a cartoon of your dream story, etc.
You are free to use any characters from Kohonda's works.
We do not accept copyrighted material from other companies.
Please refer to our submitted manga for quality.
We have commercial experience in both male and female oriented R18.
The price is for 1P. Multiple pages are 10000 x the number of P.

en.planDescription:
I've decided to try out the request feature.
If you have a theme, story or situation that you would like to see, please do try to send me a request for an article.
It will make my work easier if I can provide detailed information about the character's personality and worldview.

I look forward to seeing your requests for submissions!
en.planDescriptionHtml:
I've decided to try out the request feature.
If you have a theme, story or situation that you would like to see, please do try to send me a request for an article.
It will make my work easier if I can provide detailed information about the character's personality and worldview.

I look forward to seeing your requests for submissions!

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
MG4 is a T-Doll from the game Girls Frontline. She is a laughingstock for being very low-tier despite being one of the rarest Machine Gun T-Dolls. As a result, she is often bullied by fanart depicting her as being forced to stay on-base doing menial labor and chores rather than taking part in battles. 

I would like to commission a giant MG4 getting positive attention for once.  She would be wearing the costume in the below reference photo. 

https://iopwiki.com/images/b/b5/MG4_costume1.png
https://iopwiki.com/wiki/MG4/Quotes

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
Hello, I would like to make 1 page comic that shows first part of the story of this video: https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm12852255

For the top section, I would like it to show Haruka Amami and Chihaya Kisaragi sitting in their room. Haruka begs Chihaya to wrestle, and Chihaya reluctantly agrees, she sits down and says  "Shikata ga nai" reference: https://ibb.co/7VDN6CW  https://ibb.co/Dbjg5wM

In the bottom part of the page, show both players side by side. I would like this to take majority of the page. reference can be like 
https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/99220057  Haruka in left, Chihaya on the right
For the expressions in the bottom section, I would like Haruka to show happy that she accepted the match. For Chihaya's expression, I would like her to appear more serious. she looks like she is going for the win.

In this they are both wearing their outfit references:

Haruka: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/38751824

Chihaya:  https://images.project-imas.wiki/1/13/Chihaya9.jpg

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Glad to see Ai'ai back and back to seeing more Love Live character manga!
This time, I would like to request 3 four-panel manga requests, as I would like to see the stories already requested by another person for Î¼'s, also for the Aqours members.

Content: Afro-ization of Love Live Sunshine characters
(1) Chika, Yoh, Riko
(2) Ruby, Hanamaru, Yoshiko
(3) The third: Dia, Kanan, and Mari
We will leave the story, dialogue, etc. of each four-frame manga to Ai Ai.
We appreciate your consideration.

en.planDescription:
Any genre
4 frames per piece 7,000 yen


For those who make a request
Backgrounds will be included in the necessary frames.
We recommend 2 to 3 characters per 4 panels.
If more than four characters appear, the impression of all the characters will often be diluted.
We do not accept requests that specify more than five characters in a single four-panel piece.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Nice to meet you!
May I make a request?
The contents of the request are
I'd like to request a manga about Tenko Hinanai and Sanae Higashifuutani in Potara!
I'd like to request a manga in which they combine in Potala!

Contents
One day, Tenko is carrying an earring (Potala) that can combine with her, which was given to her by Eiku Nagae.
(2) One day, Tenko accidentally drops the earring (Potala).

(2) Sanae, who happened to be passing by, picked up the earring (Potala) and put it on her ear.
Tenko asks for it back in a hurry, but Sanae doesn't want it.

(3) Their bodies are attached to each other by the power of the potala.

(4) Sanae and Tenko are very happy to see the fusion of their bodies.

This is how I would like it to be.
requestTranslationProposal.requestProposalHtml:
Nice to meet you!
May I make a request?
The contents of the request are
I'd like to request a manga about Tenko Hinanai and Sanae Higashifuutani in Potara!
I'd like to request a manga in which they combine in Potala!

Contents
One day, Tenko is carrying an earring (Potala) that can combine with her, which was given to her by Eiku Nagae.
(2) One day, Tenko accidentally drops the earring (Potala).

(2) Sanae, who happened to be passing by, picked up the earring (Potala) and put it on her ear.
Tenko asks for it back in a hurry, but Sanae doesn't want it.

(3) Their bodies are attached to each other by the power of the potala.

(4) Sanae and Tenko are very happy to see the fusion of their bodies.

This is how I would like it to be.

en.planDescription:
I'm mainly looking for requests for girl illustrations.
Secondary creation and original.
Backgrounds are possible as long as they are accompanied.

I don't accept the ones that look painful or have a stiff feeling of unhappiness.

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
I would like to request a manga, with Hololive ID Airani_Iofifteen and a random/generic man as the main characters. 
It starts with the man mocking Iofi for being too short, and she start zapping him with a shrink gun which make him shorter than her by a head(Chest-level). She begins mocking him and kicking him which knock him and shrinks him further into the size of a mouse. She begin chasing him while trying to stomp on him. He runs away only to see  some forest with very large strange trees, which he begins to explore and exits. Only to hear the ground shaking and an enormous object above him blocking the light. He survive and finds Iofi looming above like a mountain(he shrank further to Ant size) he tries to get her attention while she's in her bed taking off her shoes and socks.
He successfully reaches her only to find it hard to climb her massive toes and begins shrinking further, Iofi notices an annoying itch on her toes and begin examining it only to find him. Feel free to ask.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Sorry, I was going to request this after subscribing to "Alice in the Land of the Criminals" but couldn't resist, so I'm sending it to you now!

I want you to draw an illustration of Alice from Minion's "Alice in the Land of the Criminal", where she grows huge in the White Rabbit's house and struggles to lift the second floor and poke her hands on the ground in order to destroy the house and escape.


More detailed orders (I would appreciate it if you could read through them)

Please draw the outside of the house first, and then the inside of the house. I said "inside," but strictly speaking, we would like you to draw Alice so that we can see her expression and the situation, so you may simplify the rooms inside the house.
If you want us to be able to see Alice's struggle at a glance, please draw waves to express movement, creaking sound effects such as "creak" and "squeak," and "Ughhhhh! I can't move! and "I can't move!" to express the house's movement.
When drawing the outside of the house, please make sure that part of her underwear can be seen from the first floor window of the White Rabbit's house.
The skirt of the Fatty Rabbit version of Alice is caught on the floor of the second floor and looks as if it is spread out like a carpet.
You do not have to draw the background.
I will post my work as a reference. https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/87373288

That's all! Thank you very much!

en.planDescription:
I like JS, DS, JY, etc. (I wouldn't say I'm good at them). JC and above depends.
I'm eccentric about anime and manga, so I can only draw what I like (e.g. Girls und Panzer, Kill Me Baby, Magical Emi, Minky Momo, etc.)
I like SM, tentacles, and mechanical things. I'm not good at Ryona and Guro.
I have a day job, so even if I'm accepted, I may not be able to work on it right away.
I'd like to know what you want other than the creative loli I draw as my main work.
The price for a single drawing can start from 3000 yen depending on your motivation.

(Rough guide)
Rough 1 pictureãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ»3000yen

It's too expensive! If you think it's too expensive, you can skip it.
If you think it's too expensive, don't worry. It's not like a manga manuscript where you can get a second income from a book or a digital copy...

In addition, of course, the copyright is not abandoned regardless of the work produced is creative, secondary.
Please use it with common sense, such as unauthorized disclosure.
Please feel free to support me.

Nice to meet you. I would like to make a request.

Here are their costumes.
Nami
 https://one-piece.com/log/character/detail/nami.html 

Nico Robinâ†“
 https://one-piece.com/log/character/detail/robin.html

Situation.
One day, Nami finds an earring (looks like a potala) and gives it to Robin, who realizes that it is an earring that can be combined.
Nami gives Robin one of the Potala earrings, and the two put the Potala earrings on their right and left ears, respectively.
Robin and Nami look at each other with the Potala in their right and left ears, respectively.
Robin and Nami look at each other's face.
The merging is complete.



This is how they will be dressed after merging.

en.planDescription:
Basically, we will release all requested drawings and cartoons to the public for the next request.
We will accept as many requests as possible, but we will cancel requests that are too expensive for the number of calories involved.


I will do my best to draw anything within my drawing ability.
I'm looking forward to your requests!
en.planDescriptionHtml:
Basically, we will release all requested drawings and cartoons to the public for the next request.
We will accept as many requests as possible, but we will cancel requests that are too expensive for the number of calories involved.


I will do my best to draw anything within my drawing ability.
I'm looking forward to your requests!

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Thank you!
I will send the request back to you again!

Page 1.
Princess Peach (in Smash Bros. X outfit) and Remilia are fighting in Smash Bros. Pokemon Stadium 2, and in the middle of the fight, a gimmick is triggered that lets the wind come out from underneath.
Their skirts fluttered up, and they both looked a little surprised.

Page 2
A strong wind suddenly came from below!
The skirt comes up at once and both of them hold it down in a hurry.

Page 3
The wind from below was so strong that both of them were lifted up and flew upward.

Page 4
Top half: Princess Peach and Remilia are blown to the back of the screen, and the screen in the middle shows Princess Peach in the process of being blown away.

Bottom half
Both of them are blown away as well, and the middle screen shows Remilia in the process of being blown away.
The middle screen shows Remilia in the process of being blown away.

One day, Nami finds an earring (looks like a Potala) and realizes that it is an earring that can combine with Robin.
Robin, who doesn't know anything about it, asks her about it, but Nami lies and says it's just an earring.
Robin, who does not know anything about it, asks her about it, but Nami lies that it is just an earring and puts it on her ear first, and then puts the Potala on Robin's ear.
Robin and Nami look at each other with the Potala in their ears.
Robin and Nami look at each other with the Potala attached and their bodies attach to each other.
The fusion is completed, and the fusion body that merged by mixing heart and mind shows a panicked look.

After the merging, they are dressed like this.

illust/96019557
Thank you for your consideration!

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
I have previously made this request with my name withheld. If you would like, please make this request here.
[Mai's suntan]
This is a parody of a story in the anime "Nintama Rantaro," in which Hyotayu takes a nap in the shade and only half of his face gets sunburned.
One summer day, Mishomai was outside drawing a picture. However, while she was painting, she didn't notice the heat and sunlight and continued to paint. Half of her face gets sunburned, leaving the other half completely white.
After the summer vacation, the other Pretty Cure heroines are surprised to see Mai in such a state.
(Image.)
Nagisa: "Mai, what's wrong?"
Mai "I was drawing in the shadows and this is what happened (looks a little embarrassed)ğŸ’¦"
Saki "Mai is all black!
Nozomi "Mai is tuna?
Rin "You know, .... ğŸ’§"
Urara "But it's so like Mai ğŸ˜Š"

 https://youtu.be/a-ClaLbtBuc

en.planDescription:
Thank you for reading!
Please read about your requestâ˜†.

About anonymous requests
If your request is anonymous, it will basically be kept private. If you are anonymous, your request will basically be kept private, and you will only be able to post the URL of your request.
If you are anonymous, please specify if you are willing to make the finished product available to the public as a whole.

About genre
We are willing to draw manga, anime, games, and other works that are not currently posted on pixiv.
We will be happy to draw manga, anime, games, etc. that are not currently posted on pixiv.
We would appreciate it if you can provide us with URLs and other information, but even if you don't have any, we can look them up for you.

About requests for illustrations
Please tell us the name of the character, full body or bust up, and the overall atmosphere.
In addition to the above, we will try our best to respond to detailed requests such as "00 in this pose" or "in this state.

About requests for cartoons
We will be happy to respond to your requests as much as possible.
The basic format is four horizontal panels per page, but if you have any requests, please specify them.

About the work
The basic size is "A5" (you can choose from A4, A5, and B5).
The number of artists is limited to 3 for illustrations, and 4 for one-page comics.
The same price applies to both full-body and bust-up drawings.
We do not accept R18 pictures, but we will accept other types of pictures such as swimsuits, pantyhose, breasts, and dark depravity.

About delivery
We will deliver in about 2 to 3 weeks, but if you are in a hurry, please specify the date.

I want her to grab both sides of the gills on Mulch's back and try to hold him down while he's flailing around! I want you to draw this in two or three frames! https://mobile.twitter.com/tanu_emon/status/1234777650385707008 ï¼ˆI'd like you to start with the second panel where the fight continues and Mulch is lying on his back and Tiana is riding on his neck and prying his mouth open up and down like she always does. I'd like you to draw it almost the same way as reference #2! (I want her to be riding a little closer to the neck than in reference 2) I want another angle of about 2 or 3 frames! (I want you to change the way he is riding the horse in the other angle.) I want him to be heavy and bubbly at this time! In the third shot, I want you to shoot a storium ray at the fallen Mulch, and when it explodes, he finally breaks his concentration mode here and says, "Whew! I want you to draw up to this point! (I'd like to see a little bit of Mulch foam on Tiana's thigh at this point, drool would be fine.)
I want you to draw as much of the horseback riding scene as possible! I want Mulch to have red eyes and be smaller and skinnier than Tiana! Tiana should be whipped, please! The location should be in the city, where it's always raining! So I want Tiana to be shiny and wet! The color timer should be blue and the costume should be made of a swimsuit-like fabric! I want it to be a cartoon, so I want it to have a few wrinkles, but not too many. Also, I want Tiana to say "shwa" and "juwa" and other Ultraman-like things! Sound effects would be great! That's all! requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Good morning.
Thank you very much for your response to my last request.
Um, may I ask for a request?
Please make a manga with Admiral Shota (5 years old), Yamato, Musashi, Nagato, Mutsu, Iowa, Akagi, and Kaga and have Yamato and his friends make Admiral Shota listen to the sound of their stomachs.

1st p.


1st panel

Shorty Admiral "Yamato big sister, Musashi big sister"
Yamato "What is it?"
Musashi "What is it? Admiral?


Panel 2


Shorty Admiral "I want to hear the sound of big sister Yamato and big sister Musashi's stomach"
Yamato: "Hmmm...it's good..."
Musashi: "It's good for me tooâ™ª"


2p for 1p


Yamato's stomach gurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.
Musashi's stomach gurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.


Shorty Admiral "Yamato big sister, Musashi big sister, you are grumbling a lotâ™ª"
Yamato "Hmmm...it's just before we eat dinner..."
Musashi "I'm not hungry..." "I'm not hungry..."

3rdp.


Panel 1
Iowa "Admiral â™ª"
Akagi "Good evening."
Shorty Admiral "Iowa big sister, Nagato big sister, Mutsu big sister, Akagi big sister, Kaga big sister"


Frame 2
Kaga "Looks like you're having fun..."
Nagato "Admiral, do you want to hear our stomach rumbles too?"
Mutsu "Just the right amount of ringing..."
Admiral Shota: "Yes, I want to hear it.


3 frames 1p min.

Akagi's stomach is grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.
Kaga's stomach is grumbling!
Shorty Admiral "wow...it's rumbling..."


Page 4, 1p min.


Nagato's stomach is gggooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
Mutsu's tummy gyuuuguuuuuuuuuu
Shorty Admiral "â™ª"
Nagato "Admiral, how's it going?
Mutsu "Isn't the sound of my sister's stomach amazing?



Page 5, 1p min.

Iowa's belly is gooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!

Iowa "Admiral listening to the sound of my stomach, it's so cuteâ™ª"
Yamato "Yesâ™ª"
Musashi "Just looking at it makes me feel at homeâ™ª"
Akagi "Reallyâ™ª"
Kaga "It makes me feel uplifted"
Nagato "Oh, Admiral's smile is our source of strength.
Mutsu "Yes..." "It cheers me up..."

en.planDescription:
Manga 5pages (color) 15,000 yen" plan

We have created a new plan limited to manga.
If you want to see a four-panel manga about "XXX and XXX" or "I want to make a manga of my own creation," please let us know!

If you would like to see a four-frame manga about "XX and â–¡â–¡" or "I want to create my own manga," please let us know!
The size will be A5 (if you prefer a different size, please specify).
Bust-up and full-body portraits are both available at the same price.
Please limit the number of characters to 8 for all pages (mobs are not included).
Please understand that it may take us about a month to complete the work due to the large number of pages. m(_ _)m Depending on the volume of requests, we may have to wait until just before the deadline. m(_ _)m

We cannot accept R18 requests.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Dear Ai'ai, welcome back! I'm so glad you're back to creating again!

I really like the stories about mandarin oranges that you used to post, and I wanted to ask you to send me two requests for manga about mandarin oranges.
I am sorry for the lengthy explanation, but I would appreciate your consideration.

Common theme:[Scent of mandarin oranges].
(1) Characters: Chika Takami, Yoh Watanabe, Yoshiko Tsushima
The story begins with Chika and Yoh accompanying Yoshiko to a special training session in order to correct Yoshiko's dislike of mandarin oranges.

Sei: This time, in order to get her to like mandarin oranges from their aroma, the two of them blow on Yoshiko's face with their fresh breath after eating a lot of mandarin oranges.
The breath hits her nose, and Yoshiko exclaims, "It smells like mandarin oranges! She exclaimed.

Tumble: Eventually, Yoshiko's eyes go round and round and she faints. Chika and Yoh feel a sense of accomplishment at having allowed Yoshiko to enjoy the scent of oranges.

Conclusion:However, they were shocked at what Yoshiko said to them; the two were smiling but shedding copious tears
Chika: "Why is that? I can't stop crying or ...."
Yoh: "You won the game and lost the match. ...."
They finished muttering to each other.

(2) Characters: Mahime Nishikino, Kaho Koizumi, Rin Hoshizora
Happening:Mahime, in an effort to overcome her dislike of mandarin oranges, asks Hanayo to blow on her breath with lots of mandarin oranges.
Despite her shyness, Koyomi is determined to help Hana-yo, and she blows on her face with her mikan-scented breath. Hana-hi tolerates the scent, but still looks pained.

Sei: Then Rin intervenes. Rin is determined to help Mahime, who seems to be in pain. Maihime and Kaho wonder what she is going to do.

Teng Rin eats a bowl of garlic ramen to neutralize the fresh aroma of the mandarin oranges, creating a thick, sticky aroma in her breath. To counteract the scent of mikan, which Mahi dislikes, Rin blows on the cottagey-scented breath so vigorously that it covers Hanayo and Mahi's entire faces.

Conclusion: Rin looks satisfied that she has now saved Mahime as well. Beside them are two people who are dizzy and round-eyed after sniffing Rin's cottage-scented breath.
Mahi: "Mikan was better ....."
Hanayo "It stinks ......"
And mutter to finish.

en.planDescription:
Any genre
4 frames per piece 7,000 yen


For those who make a request
Backgrounds will be included in the necessary frames.
We recommend 2 to 3 characters per 4 panels.
If more than four characters appear, the impression of all the characters will often be diluted.
We do not accept requests that specify more than five characters in a single four-panel piece.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Ai Ai, it's been a while ğŸ˜­

I would like to thank you from the bottom of my heart for allowing me to request again in this way. It is the best news for me as I love your illustrations.

Let me move on to the main topic.
Can you please continue with the previous work in which "Eireina Tsudo, Dia Kurosawa, Karin Asaka" appeared?

I will leave it up to Mr. Ai'i to decide what kind of story it should be. If I were to make a specific request, I would be happy if you could emphasize the punchline of "Karin pulling everyone's (Eireina and Dia) leg at a crucial moment".

Please take care of this request.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Nice to meet you, this mangahttps://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/97473637 I would like to request a color manga of Ayanami Rei-chan, who transforms into an Ultra Heroine, fighting monsters. The manga will be about Rei fighting Stegon, a fossil dinosaur. The situation is described on each page, but we would appreciate it if you could draw as much as you can.

P1: Rei transforms and stands in front of Stegon, and quickly kicks him in the mouth, frightening him.

P2: Realizing that he has no chance of winning, Stegon turns his back on Rey and tries to run away. Rey jumps on his back and holds him down to keep Stegon from escaping. Stegon looks heavy and painful.

P3: Stegon resists trying to shake off Rey who is on his back. Rey clamps down on Stegon's neck mercilessly. Stegon is in agony as drool flows from his mouth.

P4: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/97473637 Please make Rey jump up into the sky after confirming that he has killed Stegon, as shown in page 4 of the following page.

Thank you very much for your consideration.

en.planDescription:
Thank you for choosing me out of so many.
I draw copyrighted/original illustrations and manga mainly for boys and girls. I would be very motivated if you could give me detailed explanations when you make a request! I am not used to doing this, but I will do my best to satisfy the client.

Illustration
 From 3,000 yen

Short cartoon
From 4,000 yen

The price for both illustrations and cartoons may vary depending on the number of sheets, whether they are in color or not, and other factors.
Please feel free to contact us for other requests.
Please feel free to contact us.
